response.overview: "Trypophobia is an aversion to the sight of irregular patterns or clusters of small holes, or bumps."  The follow up that nobody asked for is finally here. Set before the events of the first TRYPOPHOBIA short film, TRYPOPHOBIA 2 documents one woman's struggle for survival,  during the first outbreak of the TRYPO VIRUS. Inspired by films such as THE SUBSTANCE, 28 Days Later, and World War Z.
response.title: Trypophobia Part 2
